info_message.message:
- Kronos will send the current page to the designated inbox.

    - This could be an email to a service like Kill-the-Newsletter or the uri of
    an external application (i.e. 'shortcuts://', 'reeder://', etc.) for a lightweight
    read-later system. 

    - Click title to access recently saved.
info_message.description: Message displayed from usage info button
